metadata.title: Okra Thoran or Okra-Coconut Stir Fry
metadata.description:
Okra or Lady's finger is cooked with grated coconut and made into a delicious South Indian vegetarian dish.  This is served as a side dish along with Rice and curries.
Connect with me via:
Fb: https://www.facebook.com/CookingwithThas/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/thasneen
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/thasneen/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cookingwiththas/

transcription: [00:00.000] Wash and trim the okra, cut into small pieces.
[00:10.000] Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
[00:15.000] Add mustard seeds and let them splutter.
[00:20.000] Add curry leaves and green chilies, saut√© for a few seconds.
[00:25.000] Add the chopped okra and turmeric powder, salt to taste.
[00:35.000] Stir well and cook covered for 8-10 minutes on low heat.
[00:50.000] Add grated coconut and mix gently.
[01:00.000] Cook uncovered for 2 more minutes, stirring occasionally.
[01:15.000] Remove from heat and serve as a side dish with rice.
